Class SQLUtil

  • java.lang.Object

      • assembleInsertSQLStatement

        public static java.lang.String assembleInsertSQLStatement(DataRecordMetadata metadata,
                                          java.lang.String tableName,
                                          JdbcSpecific specific)
        Creates SQL insert statement based on metadata describing data flow and supplied table name
        Parameters:
        metadata - Metadata describing data flow from which to feed database
        tableName - Table name into which insert data
        specific - Used JDBC specific.
        Returns:
        string containing SQL insert statement
        Since:
        October 2, 2002

        public static DataFieldMetadata dbMetadata2jetel(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.sql.ResultSetMetaData dbMetadata,

                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Same as dbMetadata2jetel(name, dbMetadata, sqlIndex, jdbcSpecific, true)

        java.sql.SQLException

      • dbMetadata2jetel

        public static DataFieldMetadata dbMetadata2jetel(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.sql.ResultSetMetaData dbMetadata,
                                 int sqlIndex,
                                 JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific,
                                 boolean failIfUnknownType)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates clover data field metadata compatible with database column metadata
        Parameters:
        name - clover field name
        dbMetadata - result set metadata
        sqlIndex - index of result set column (1 based)
        jdbcSpecific -
        failIfUknownType - indicates whether to throw exception if there is unknown column type in DB metadata.
        Returns:
        clover data field metadata compatible with database column metadata
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • dbMetadata2jetel

        public static DataRecordMetadata dbMetadata2jetel(java.sql.ResultSetMetaData dbMetadata,
                                  JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific,
                                  boolean failIfUknownType)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Converts SQL metadata into Clover's DataRecordMetadata
        Parameters:
        dbMetadata - SQL ResultSet metadata describing which columns are returned by query
        failIfUknownType - indicates whether to throw exception if there is unknown column type in DB metadata.
        Returns:
        DataRecordMetadata which correspond to the SQL ResultSet
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Description of the Exception

      • isActive

        public static boolean isActive(java.sql.Connection conn)

        Parameters:
        conn - JDBC connection object
        Returns:
        true if connection valid/open otherwise false

        public static void closeConnection(java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                   java.sql.Statement stmt,

      • split

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String sql)
        Deprecated. Use SQLScriptParser instead
        Splits a string into individual queries, ignores semicolons within strings and comments.
        Parameters:
        sql -
        Returns:
        individual queries

      • split

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String sql,
                                  java.lang.String delimiter)
        Deprecated. Use SQLScriptParser instead
        Splits a string into individual queries, ignores SQL statements separator within strings and comments.
        Parameters:
        sql -
        delimiter - string separating individual SQL statements in the input sql. If null, default ";" separator will be used.
        Returns:
        individual SQL statements
